projects.name: findBlue
projects.description: Developed a networking platform for University of Michigan students and professors to connect through research, projects, and internships, featuring a responsive React.js frontend, secure login, and Supabase-managed data storage.

projects.name: playlistly
projects.description: Created a full-stack web application using Flask, React.js, and TypeScript to interact with the Spotify API, enabling users to generate personalized playlists with secure Spotify OAuth2 authentication and a dynamic, responsive frontend.

projects.name: logify
projects.description: Developed a secure passwordless authentication system using Flask, featuring time-sensitive OTPs with pyotp, tokenized login links via itsdangerous, Flask-Mail integration, and a responsive Bootstrap-styled interface for a seamless and robust user experience.

projects.name: invently.ai
projects.description: Developed a full-stack inventory management platform using Flask and React.js with TypeScript, featuring real-time analytics, AI-powered insights, dynamic data visualizations with Chart.js, and integrated Stripe and Google Gemini APIs for subscription management and enhanced decision-making.

projects.name: Ultimatum
projects.description: Engineered a Discord bot using Discord.js and MongoDB to manage user preferences and server settings, deployed to 50+ servers with a dashboard for seamless command customization and enhanced usability.

projects.name: Ineed.io
projects.description: led the design and development of an "Internship Tracker" platform to help students crush their internship hunt.  It features a central dashboard, cool progress graphs (like on GitHub), interview prep tools, and even some fun game-like features like leaderboards and KD ratios to keep things interesting.
